name: Stop the Spread (Reg)
description:
Thanks for checking out my first game!

It's a simple zombie game in which you need to minimise the number of casualties, less is more!

I need to thank Sebastian Lague, as his YouTube tutorial series on procedural planet generation was the basis for the planet in this game. All of his content is amazing! https://www.youtube.com/user/Cercopithecan
